title: Body and Soul
description: Anna Summers exists in a secluded, changeless world - an enclosed nun. At thirty-one, she is conscious of time beating at her back. Despite her faith, does she crave to love a man, bear a child, before it is too late? When her brother's suicide forces her out into the unfamiliar world, she finds she must come to terms with her sexual identity.
author: Marcelle Bernstein
